page.title: 05LIFE-STYLES
page.content: We wear School uniform to make us look smart.We wear white shirts, blouses, grey trousers,blue/black skirts,blue cardigans with black and red ties when we go to Stanley Road and the boys wear grey or white shirt,black or grey trousers and grey or blue jumpers.In the Summer the girls wear white and red summer dresses and a cardigan. The boys wear shorts and a shirt with a jumper. A blouse/shirt is worn on the top part of the body Skirts./Trousers are worn on the lower part of the body . Shoes and socks are worn on the feet.Ties are worn round the neck. Under the Shirt/Blouse a vest is worn to keep us warm.Under trousers boys wear pants and girls wear knickers under their skirts. A Blouse is for Girls and shirt for Boys to wear.Ties/jumpers are for Boys and Girls.
